actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor

official_title: A bill to provide for a study relating to a consumer price index for the elderly.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to: (1) study the need for, and the desirability of, a price index reflecting changes in the prices of goods and services generally purchased by the elderly; and (2) report to the Congress regarding such study within one year of this Act's enactment.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study relating to a consumer price index for the elderly.
